-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local UnityEngine = UnityEngine
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("PathHelper", function (namespace)
    local getAppHotfixResPath, getAppResPath, getAppResPath4Web
    getAppHotfixResPath = function ()
      local game = UnityEngine.Application.getproductName()
      local path = getAppResPath()
      if UnityEngine.Application.getisMobilePlatform() then
        path = UnityEngine.Application.getpersistentDataPath() .. "/" .. game .. "/"
      end
      return path
    end
    getAppResPath = function ()
      return UnityEngine.Application.getstreamingAssetsPath()
    end
    getAppResPath4Web = function ()
      return UnityEngine.Application.getstreamingAssetsPath()
    end
    return {
      getAppHotfixResPath = getAppHotfixResPath,
      getAppResPath = getAppResPath,
      getAppResPath4Web = getAppResPath4Web,
      __metadata__ = function (out)
        return {
          properties = {
            { "AppHotfixResPath", 0x20E, System.String, getAppHotfixResPath },
            { "AppResPath", 0x20E, System.String, getAppResPath },
            { "AppResPath4Web", 0x20E, System.String, getAppResPath4Web }
          },
          class = { 0xE }
        }
      end
    }
  end)
end)
